duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver operational instruction and field applications-based content to new customers to prepare them to use the MX908 in a variety of operational environments.
Developing training content and instructional design aligned with a manufacturer-certified curriculum.
Deliver training remotely, online, and in person, including end-user training and instructor development training for contractors.
Prepare operations plans for training projects, conduct pre-sales support, and perform service checks on devices.
Shadow customers, provide feedback on proper device usage, and complete device troubleshooting and repair in the field.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent work experience. Professional instructor certification preferred.
